SELECT m2.name , m2.mem_seq , GROUP_CONCAT(atndc_dt order by atndc_dt asc SEPARATOR ', ' ) AS monthDays , GROUP_CONCAT(atndc_cd order by atndc_dt asc SEPARATOR ', ' ) AS monthTypes , GROUP_CONCAT((select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=m1.atndc_cd ) order by atndc_dt asc SEPARATOR ', ' ) AS monthTypesNm , (select count(*) from co_cmssr_atndc_mst where mem_seq = m1.mem_seq and atndc_cd not in('CMSSR_ ATTEND_002','CMSSR_ ATTEND_005') and year=#{year}) as total FROM co_cmssr_atndc_mst m1 inner join co_mem_mst m2 on m1.mem_seq = m2.mem_seq where year=#{year} and mnth=#{mnth} and m2.wthdrw_yn=#{wthdrwYn} GROUP BY m1.mem_seq
limit #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

select (select count(*) from co_cmssr_atndc_mst where atndc_cd ='CMSSR_ATTEND_001' and mem_seq=#{detailsKey}) as cnstg_cnt /* MPDCmtMapper.selectKenMonthCnt */ , (select count(*) from co_cmssr_atndc_mst where atndc_cd ='CMSSR_ATTEND_002' and mem_seq=#{detailsKey}) as atndn_cnt , (select count(*) from co_cmssr_atndc_mst where atndc_cd ='CMSSR_ATTEND_003' and mem_seq=#{detailsKey}) as lecture_cnt , (select count(*) from co_cmssr_atndc_mst where atndc_cd ='CMSSR_ATTEND_004' and mem_seq=#{detailsKey}) as cpcpty_dvlpm_cnt , (select count(*) from co_cmssr_atndc_mst where atndc_cd ='CMSSR_ATTEND_005' and mem_seq=#{detailsKey}) as annual_cnt , (select count(*) from co_cmssr_atndc_mst where atndc_cd ='CMSSR_ATTEND_006' and mem_seq=#{detailsKey}) as home_cnt , (select count(*) from co_cmssr_atndc_mst where atndc_cd ='CMSSR_ATTEND_007' and mem_seq=#{detailsKey}) as etc_cnt from co_cmssr_atndc_mst where year=#{year} and mnth =#{mnth} and mem_seq=#{detailsKey} group by mem_Seq

select cmpn_mst.cmpn_nm /* MPDCmtMapper.selectKenCmpnList */ , appctn_mst.appctn_bsnm_no , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=appctn_mst.first_rgns_cd ) as first_rgns_cd_nm , appctn_mst.first_rgns_cd , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=appctn_mst.scnd_rgns_cd ) as scnd_rgns_cd_nm , appctn_mst.scnd_rgns_cd , rsume_mst.cnstg_seq from cp_cnstg_appctn_mst appctn_mst inner join cp_cnstg_rsume_mst rsume_mst on appctn_mst.cnstg_seq = rsume_mst.cnstg_seq inner join cp_cmpn_mst cmpn_mst on appctn_mst.appctn_bsnm_no = cmpn_mst.bsnm_no where init_vst_rslt_cd ='BF_JDGMT_RSLT01' and rsume_mst.cmssr_seq =#{detailsKey} and ( rsume_mst.guide_pscnd_cd not in('GUIDE_PSCND04') or rsume_mst.cnstg_pscnd_cd not in('CNSTG_PSCND03') ) order by appctn_mst.cnstg_seq

select atndc_cd /* MPDCmtMapper.selectKenCmpnDtl */ , cnstg_seq_1 , guide_part_cmpn_1 , rgns_1 , cnstg_seq_2 , guide_part_cmpn_2 , rgns_2 , etc_bsntrp , etc from co_cmssr_atndc_mst ccam where mem_seq=#{detailsKey} and year =#{year} and mnth=#{mnth} and dd=#{dd}
